publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3123 Brian Adam: Family History Societies Support-That the Parliament recognises the excellent work being done by the many volunteer genealogists within the network of family history societies throughout Scotland, despite facing problems of unsuitable accommodation and lack of funding and support, and asks the Scottish Executive to consider how it might best support this network as part of the geneaology tourism niche market strategy.

S1M-3123 Brian Adam: Family History Societies Support-That the Parliament recognises the excellent work being done by the many volunteer genealogists within the network of family history societies throughout Scotland, despite facing problems of unsuitable accommodation and lack of funding and support, and asks the Scottish Executive to consider how it might best support this network as part of the geneaology tourism niche market strategy. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*

S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fergus Ewing*, Shona Robison*, Donald Gorrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Fiona McLeod*, Richard Lochhead*

S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Murdo Fraser*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Irene McGugan*, David Mundell*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Michael Russell*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Colin Campbell*
S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3123 Family History Societies Support (lodged on 16 May 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
